error.development: The system encountered an unexpected error, please try again later.
error.support: If the problem persists, please contact technical support and provide the error ID

globalError.title: System Error

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: Sorry, the page you are looking for does not exist
notFound.message: The page you are looking for may have been deleted, moved, or the URL is incorrect.
notFound.support: If you believe this is an error, please contact our technical support

unauthorized.title: Access Denied
unauthorized.description: Sorry, you do not have permission to access this page
unauthorized.message: This page is only accessible to administrators. If you believe this is an error, please contact the system administrator.
unauthorized.adminContact: To obtain administrator permissions, please contact the system administrator
